DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to identify a surrogate serum marker for tumor hypoxia in patients with lung cancers.
DOC.brief_title: Identification of Serum Markers For Tumor Hypoxia in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancers
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed patients with lung cancer who are undergoing surgical resection of their tumors Patients without nonsmall cell lung cancer
